name: Random Hell Rush
description:
A tower defence game prototype that I made for a case interview.

99% of the visuals were made by my talented friend Halit Deniz Ateş.

Click buttons to randomly place towers, click on towers to upgrade and click on the path to spill holy water if it's available.

It's a very short game that only has 3 levels rn. Might add an auto-level generator or might not.
